title: Prince Harry's new-dad tears are touching, but they'll soon dry up once the realities of fatherhood kick in
text:
When I think of the advice I’ve been given around parenting, two pieces stand out.

The first came from a very smart woman who I knew through work. She said, “Just do one thing. Put them to sleep at 7pm every day. Build your routine around that.” This was just before the birth of child number one.

The second, more observational piece of advice came from a male friend shortly before child number two arrived. He said, “Heather and I decided to have a second child because sometimes we had 15 minutes to ourselves.”

That line came to mind this morning when I read that Prince Harry had come over all tearful about parenthood. Now, Harry broke down during a speech at the WellChild rewards for inspiring...
